**MACHINERY**

* **CLEANING RISK MATRIX** 17

| **Cleaning Risk Matrix** | | | | | | | |
|  | | | **Severity** | | | | |
| Impact Level | | | No Immed. Impact | Minor Impact | Moderate Impact | Significant Impact | Detrimental Impact |
|  | | | Low | Minor | Moderate | Major | Extreme |
| 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 |
| **Likelihood** | Almost Certain | 5 | 5 | 10 | 15 | 20 | 25 |
| Likely | 4 | 4 | 8 | 12 | 16 | 20 |
| Possible | 3 | 3 | 6 | 9 | 12 | 15 |
| Unlikely | 2 | 2 | 4 | 6 | 8 | 10 |
| Rare | 1 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | **Likelihood (L) x Severity (S)** | | |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | **Score** | **Risk Control Required** | |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  | High | 17-25 | Daily | |  |  |  |
|  | Medium | 11-16 | Weekly | |  |  |  |
|  | Low | 7-10 | Monthly | |  |  |  |
|  | Very Low | 3-6 | Bi-annually | |  |  |  |
|  | Extremely Low | 0-2 | Annually or when necessary | |  |  |  |
